title: Could Lewis Hamilton really leave Mercedes?
description: Daniel Ricciardo gets his second podium, Mercedes beat Ferrari’s record of 6 straight Contructors’ Championship and more of the history at the Emilia Romagna Grand Prix.
itunes:title: Could Lewis Hamilton really leave Mercedes?
itunes:author: ESPN, Alexis Nunes, Laurence Edmondson, Nate Saunders
itunes:subtitle: Daniel Ricciardo gets his second podium, Mercedes beat Ferrari’s record of 6 straight Contructors’ Championship and more of the history at the Emilia Romagna Grand Prix.
itunes:summary: Daniel Ricciardo gets his second podium, Mercedes beat Ferrari’s record of 6 straight Contructors’ Championship and more of the history at the Emilia Romagna Grand Prix.
content:encoded: Daniel Ricciardo gets his second podium, Mercedes beat Ferrari’s record of 6 straight Contructors’ Championship and more of the history at the Emilia Romagna Grand Prix.
